  • From Marbury v. Madison, the political wisdom of the Supreme Court


    December 21, 2020
    Introduction Since its inception, United States Supreme Court has always been regarded as the stoic third branch of the federal government, wielding its sword at the sole discretion of Justitia. After being confirmed by the Senate, Justices ascent the marble steps of the legal Pantheon and foreverly parted with political sophistry. But is that so? If we look at the history of the Court, it is not hard to find that the Court, as an institution, has been dragged into...

  • page


    December 21, 2020
    In this first iteration of the Tufte-Jekyll theme, a post and a page have exactly the same layout. That means that all the typographic and structural details are identical between the two. Pages and Posts Jekyll provides for both pages and posts in its default configuration. I have left this as-is. Posts Conceptually, posts are for recurring pieces of similar content such as might be found in a typical blog entry. Post content all sits in a folder named _posts...

  • About


    December 21, 2020
    The Tufte-Jekyll theme is a natural extension of the work done by Edward Tufte and his collaborators on Github who created a CSS file that allows web writers to use the same simple and elegant style employed in his published materials. To incorporate these styles into a Jekyll theme, I have made some very slight modifications that attempt to maintain the feel of the CSS styles in his Github repo. Note that this is a full-width layout. This was accomplished...

  • 中文传统书信


    April 13, 2020
    简介 书信是一种向特定对象传递消息、交流思想感情对应用文书。信在古文中有音讯、消息之意，另外，信也有托人所传之言可信的意思，亲笔给亲戚、朋友、同事写信，不仅可以传达自己的思想感情，而且可以给收信人以见字如画的亲切感……
